website_summaries.verdict: A walkie-talkie with great indoor reception, though its overall range can be limited.
pros: Easy to use, with decent range, GMRS or FRS frequency options, and crystal-clear sound
Users report radio works when communicating in different buildings
cons: Some users find range does not get near 5 miles
Reports of radios failing after a few months of use
Earpieces tend to fail within the first year or two of use
Some issues with chargers not working well, or faulty connection to radio

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$$
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than other 2-way radios but worth it in my opinion. We have had 2 for close to 10 years. Needed a second pair so tried a number of cheaper alternatives but they never worked nearly as well as these. Finally decided to spend the money on a second pair of these and wish I would have done so to begin with. Definitely a superior product and will last you a long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherlady

customer_reviews.title: mediocre valued radio.
customer_reviews.text: I got several of these for restaurant servers. battery last longer than others. radio time to time doesn't work and needs to be reset. ear piece is highly recommended for use at loud places. expensive compared to true value.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H.

customer_reviews.title: Charger problem
customer_reviews.text: Biggest problem with this unit is the charger that won’t connect properly. It needs only a few months worth of placing the unit on charger before the red light starts blinking indicating a bad connection.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yeow

customer_reviews.title: Limited range
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to use but only had a range of about 1 mile not 5 miles.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Good Radio
customer_reviews.text: The newer batteries do not seem to last as long as they did in the early days. These radios hold up very well, most of our employees have the same radio for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great range and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these walkies for 15 years. Excellent value and great range.
customer_reviews.author: snoqualmiedan

customer_reviews.title: Reliable but not great
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but not awesome. For the price on the market it could be better. One positive aspect is reliability. Voice is not great but it always works.
customer_reviews.author: Atanas Mitov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: radio works great and is perfectly compatible with our other Motorola CLS radios
customer_reviews.author: Loren Miller

customer_reviews.title: Clarity is Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We are able to travel with them to the schools nearby and we here each other very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: All good - a little more expensive
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive than I have had to pay in the past to replace these with other vendors - but other than that ...all good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our 130,000 warehousing facility for communication between our workers. They work perfectly! I would highly recommend these 2 way Radio's to anyone in our industry.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Good radio!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. It was a little tricky changing the frequencies and codes. But nothing a YouTube video couldn't fix. Pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio, don't really know why is it so expensive for a one channel radio tho
customer_reviews.author: Alex Garibay

customer_reviews.title: Push-To-Talk button not working
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this radio for 8 months and the 'push to talk' button actually turns OFF the radio though the battery is charged and functioning, the frequency is correctly set, and the headset is properly plugged. I cannot return it. Alas.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: I needed a radio that could work through brick and ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a radio that could work through brick and cement walls on a multi-building campus. This radio does the job, where the cheaper, 1/2 watt radios sold at Costco etc. in a multi-pack just couldn't hack it. The radio taps out eventually so your mileage my vary, but it's worked for our application which includes communication from one building into another separated by about 1000ft of parking lot and two or more cement walls.
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: It works.........but,
customer_reviews.text: The radio just feels very flimsy. Not one I would ever recommend "accidentally" dropping. The sound is clear and it does what it is supposed to do. I just don't feel it will last in a warehouse environment. Next order will be for something a little more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We use this oin our assisted living facility with 53 beds. It's very durable and is very clear when talking to each other. It's awesome v
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G. Nield

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Works inside our warehouse loud and clear. We have a steel build with walls in between and our currant radios will not work inside. I would recommend these for sure. Going to order another one today.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a truly a wonderful service and the products are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Charger didnt work out of the box. We have had to use one of our other chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: product arrived and worked as stated. Item was shipped in original box and worked great. Item was also arrived in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh Bhakta

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would of worked better for the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would of worked better for the price!! Very expensive for 5 miles but when driving a lot of choppy communication!!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Garza

customer_reviews.title: FCC License Required!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak to the quality of the device, but only that we are unable to use ours because nowhere on this product's page here is there an indication that the device requires an FCC license. YOU MUST GET AN FCC LICENSE! Go to the FCC website and locate one of the "Frequency Coordinators" to complete the application process if you decide that a license is worth the effort and added cost (over $400 half of which is the fee for a 10-year license). Do a web search for the CLS-1110 manual to get detailed specs for easing the application process. I wouldn't have bought this radio if I knew a license was required.
customer_reviews.author: FriendlyTech

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: After having tried less expensive walkie talkies, it's a pleasure to have some that we can count on to communicate with disabled smokers in our home. They are simple to use and just work.
customer_reviews.author: HRA

customer_reviews.title: Worked great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Worked great right out of the box. I thought I would have problems getting this radio to work with the other radios at the truck stop where I. I did not really happy. I just walked in I heard a small beep and it worked. I have used it 3 days so far.
customer_reviews.author: james d. kietzer

customer_reviews.title: Good Radio
customer_reviews.text: These radios are durable, have good range, and are easy to setup and use. We have 10 of them at one facility and 7 at another. They last much longer than some of the other brands we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Dean C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great!!! you will not regret it, after you set it up right.
customer_reviews.author: Uugii

customer_reviews.title: Great radios!
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our business and they work great for managers and employees to keep in touch. Prefer these over the battery operated radios.
customer_reviews.author: Krisann2

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Easy to use. These little radios provide all the same features available as in much more expensive radios. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in construction and has yet to complain about this product, which means it works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: O. sanchez

customer_reviews.title: durable #1 choice
customer_reviews.text: can't beat these. they're the # 1 choice among my crews. i've tried cheaper radios, but they're constantly breaking, while these hold strong. and its a very fair price for such a high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as replacement items for my company. The price was great, and they work just fine. Again, why do I need so many words to place a review? It doesn't encourage me to do more reviews, thats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: coleenie

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish i could find some that were a little better cheap for an older model two way radio. However they do work well, and came in a speedy manner. Wish they came with the generic head sets, some sellers before included the, but besides that all good.
customer_reviews.author: mike Stefanelli

customer_reviews.title: Only for light office environments
customer_reviews.text: Nearly unusable for a warehouse environment. Radio waves have issues permeating the thicker walls in a warehouse environment and receive plenty of interference when near metal. Durability is like that of a cheap sub-40 dollar radio, with the antennae snapping off with the slightest nudge. Only reason I'm forced to use one is because the bosses can't be bothered to purchase the correct equipment for the correct environments.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tran

customer_reviews.title: A little spendy but worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: We've had these radios about 2 weeks now, they work great. In buildings they will work easily a half a mile or more (and that is through buildings) Overall, good product, somewhat rugged pretty strait forward. Nice radio.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Darger

customer_reviews.title: They are WAY BETTER. You are Welcome
customer_reviews.text: Dear Jeremy, Please try theese walkie talkies. They are WAY BETTER. You are Welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love this radio! I love the sounds it makes. It charged quickly and came with all the instructions and documentation. I'm glad I went with a new one instead of refurb. I'm going to be working with it for a very long time and I will rest assured it can go the distance. Also it got here very quickly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R.C. White

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. I work in a 16 story building. I get great reception on all floors. From the basement to the 16th.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

product_meta.title: Motorola Business CLS1110 5-Mile 1-Channel UHF Two-Way Radio
product_meta.description:
Motorola Business CLS1110 5-Mile 1-Channel UHF Two-Way Radio

AMAZON.COM


Delivering remarkable functionality at the push of a button, the CLS 1110 on-site two-way radio is designed for the fast pace of business. It operates on a single channel with a choice of 56 business-exclusive frequencies for enhanced voice quality, privacy and reliability. This radio is part of CLS series, an easy-to-use, affordable wireless solution from Motorola.

ENHANCE YOUR PRODUCTIVITY
Designed with business productivity in mind, CLS Series radios and headsets provide a communications solution that is not only smart, simple and reliable, but also able to withstand the daily rigors of the workplace.

Lightweight Durability
Weighing just ounces, CLS Series radio handsets are designed to be comfortable to wear, yet durable enough to withstand everyday use.

Business Exclusive Frequencies
CLS Series radios operate on 56 different business exclusive frequencies and feature 121 codes, which means you can rely on getting a clear signal (FCC License is required for use).

Dependable Coverage
One watt of power provides coverage of up to 200,000 sq. ft or 15 floors.

Long Lasting Battery Life
A rechargeable Lithium Ion battery provides up to 12 hours of use, more than enough for a standard work shift.

Convenient Charging
An easy-to-use drop-in charger keeps radios charged, ready--and centrally located.

Keypad Lock
Helps prevent settings from being accidentally changed, limiting unnecessary downtime.

Call Tones
3 selectable call tones alert users of incoming transmissions.

Fast Settings Transfer
CLS Series radios are cloning capable with the use of a multi-unit charger accessory, which allows you to quickly copy settings from radio to radio.

BUILT FOR YOUR BUSINESS
Retail
Raise the level of customer service by enabling employees to communicate instantly. With the CLS Series, all retail activities, from restocking to security are enhanced. Cashiers can perform price checks at a moments notice. Managers have a constant eye on customer flow and inventory. And security is always alert and ready for any potential in-store problems.

Restaurant
The restaurant business is as fast-paced as they come, and quality service is a key ingredient for success. The CLS Series enhances efficiency by allowing hosts, managers, kitchen and waitstaff to instantly connect, minimizing wait times, getting food out quicker and controlling the pace of large parties. It all adds up to more table turns with greater satisfaction.

Hospitality
The CLS Series makes everything from arrival to departure seamless. Coordinate restaurant and hotel staff, event planners, security, cleaning and maintenance personnel though efficient, uninterrupted communication with minimal guest interference. Security is also enhanced, allowing for immediate response to emergencies or suspicious situations.

Education
Maintaining order and ensuring student safety are priorities for any school. Whether monitoring assemblies, sporting events, or cafeteria time, the CLS Series helps keep things running smoothly. It's also an effective way to increase maintenance staff productivity, direct busing activities and bolster school security.

EXCELLENCE IN DESIGN; REAL WORLD BENEFITS
Enhance Security
With security and safety such a major concern, your team will be able to coordinate quickly, and respond to disturbances, accidents or emergencies.

Reduce Costs
Helps utilize resources more efficiently and productively, so you can get the most out of employees. And, there are no monthly fees or service contracts to worry about.

Simplify Daily Tasks
With little to no training required, CLS radios are remarkably simple to use, making them ideal for high employee turnover industries. Helping to eliminate wasted time and inefficient processes is simple with communication provided at the touch of a button.

Heighten Service
By enabling instant communication between employees, customer needs are better and more quickly served.



CLS 1110 SPECS

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One CLS1110 Two-Way Radio, Drop-In Radio and Battery Charger, Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery, Radio Carry Holster, AC Adapter, and User's Guide
feature_bullets: Ideal for businesses that are labor-intensive or have high employee turnover
Operates on 56 business-exclusive frequencies and features 121 codes for added security
Rechargeable lithium ion battery provides up to 18 hours of battery life. Choice of rechargeable lithium ion or backup AAA, with accessory.
Transmits up to 200,000 square feet, or up to 15 floors in a multi-level building
Key pad lock prevents accidental changes to the settings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
